channel.title: Re: [562]java is not recognized?[562]
channel.description:
yeah so the thing is i changed my comp from xp to win7(i felt it kinda better) and forgot to make a path so jagexscape 562 works and made the path so i runned the server and everything worked now to the client its says "java" is not a recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. and it goes really fast and then i changed the exit to pause so i could see wats writtin on it and heres a pic i took
pic:[img]http://i20.servimg.com/u/f20/15/30/15/20/help_m10.jpg[/img]
i hope somebody responds soon i really would like to code 562 servers
for more info here is the code in my client [code]@echo off java -Xmx120m -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0 pause[/code]
im reposting this cause the real topic is about 7pages away i think nobody will see it there
and yea i made environmental variables
